caption.p: Cytotoxic activities of methanol extract of R. vulgaris (SB) and Doxorubicin against Vero cells. R. vulgaris methanol extract concentration ranged from 100 μg/ml to 1.5625 μg/ml. Doxorubicin concentration ranged from 50 μg/ml to 0.78125 μg/ml. Doxorubicin exhibited an IC50 value of 16.37 μg/ml
